translations.english: Zhao chancellor Zhang Er as King of Changshan.

translations.chinese: 漢王怨羽之背約，欲攻之，丞相蕭何 諫，乃止。
translations.english: King Han resented Xiang Yu for breaking the agreement and wanted to attack him. Chancellor Xiao He advised against it, so he stopped.

translations.chinese: 夏四月，諸侯罷戲下，各就國。
translations.english: In the fourth month of summer, the feudal lords departed from Xixia and each went to their kingdoms.

translations.chinese: 羽使卒三萬人從漢王，楚子、諸侯人之慕從者數萬人，從杜南入蝕中。
translations.english: Xiang Yu sent 30,000 troops to follow King Han, and Chu nobles and feudal lords who admired and followed him numbered several tens of thousands. They entered Shuzhong from Dushan.

translations.chinese: 張良辭歸韓，漢王送至褒中，因說漢王燒絕棧道，以備諸侯盜兵，亦視項羽無東意。
translations.english: Zhang Liang took leave to return to Han. King Han escorted him to Baozhong, where Zhang Liang advised King Han to burn and destroy the plank roads to guard against bandit troops of the feudal lords, and also to show Xiang Yu that he had no intention of going east.
